body.p: A Kentucky merchant. Born in Wilmington, Ohio. Relocated to Hawesville, Kentucky in 1840. Married twice, first to Emily Shrader Powers, and on a second occasion to Susana Allen Powers. Father of Joshua Dever Powers, David Powers, and Emma Powers. Member of the Masonic Order at Hancock Lodge, No. 115 in Hawesville.
